CustomField.description: This field takes the value of "Phone2" and formats it with country code, based on market unit
CustomField.formula: IF( BEGINS(Phone2__c , '+45' ) , Phone2__c , IF( BEGINS(Phone2__c , '45' ) , '+' + Phone2__c , IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(Phone2__c , '+45' )) , OR( ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'DFJ_DK') , ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'Testamente_DK'))) , '+45' + Phone2__c , IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(Phone2__c , '+' )) , OR( ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'DFJ_DK') , ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'Testamente_DK'))) , '+' + Phone2__c , IF( BEGINS(Phone2__c , '+46' ) , Phone2__c , IF( BEGINS(Phone2__c , '46' ) , '+' + Phone2__c , IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(Phone2__c , '+46' )) , ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'FA_SE')) , '+46' + Phone2__c , IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(Phone2__c , '+' )) , ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'FA_SE')) , '+46' + Phone2__c , Phone2__c ))))))))
CustomField.label: Phone2 Formatted
